title: What is the correct procedure to get admission for the class 6 in Kendriya Vidyalaya? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hey, there are some pros and cons also about the admission Pros : You have to apply online for that by visiting the official site of Kendriya Vidyalaya and about correct procedure they will take a admission test of yours and if you score a good marks n that examination then you’ll get a seat there. Cons: They give a priority to those students at first who belongs to a Government Employee Child or defence employee child and after that seat persists vacant then they’ll allow you a seat(A sad truth about talented students). Because it is INDIA and Reservations are the first thing everyone wants there… Now either it is reservations for SC/ST or for the Govt. Employees during admissions or at any field. But don’t get demotivated by my words I’ve only showed you the truth about today's scenario if you’ve talent you’ll surely get admitted into the School. BEST OF LUCK.
